Topic.Title: Unable to create a new game - Active Lit

Posts.EditableText:
Whenever I try to click on the Create New Game icon in my account, I get this message:
quest.activelit.com refused to connect

With the icon that looks like a sad piece of paper  - almost like a plugin didn't load or something.

I am only seeing this WITHIN Active Lit - not from the main site (I can create a game there, no problem)

Anyone else seeing this or have any ideas?
Thanks!
